dict.acceptation: 陈列，展览；展览品，陈列品；表明；[法]（证据等的）提出；

sent.orig: Advisory services include exhibition, exhibition planning, booking and dispensing booth, booth design, exhibition layout.
sent.trans: 服务内容包括展会咨询，展览策划，展位预定及调剂，展位设计，展场布置。

sent.orig: Guangzhou Philatelic Exhibition Center is nearly 1500 square meters, set up three major exhibition hall.
sent.trans: 博览馆展出面积近1500平方米，设三大展厅。

sent.orig: This time, the part originally the cloth exhibition's worker also runs in the exhibition hall looked.
sent.trans: 此时，部分原本在展馆内布展的工人也跑出来看。

sent.orig: This exhibition will be reasonably arranged according to the grand building of the new exhibition hall.
sent.trans: 本次展会将依托新展览馆的恢弘建筑合理布局。

sent.orig: Exhibition Area: The exhibition covers a total floor space of12, 000 sq. m.
sent.trans: 展览面积：本届展览面积达12，000平方米。
